name: Al-Hadikhia
ability: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

legacy.otherNightReminder: Al-Hadikhia may choose 3 players. If chosen, announce them publicly. Each chosen player silently chooses to live or die. If all choose to live, all die instead.

night.label: Choose 3 players
night.description: Each night, Al-Hadikhia may choose 3 players: each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

information.customMessage: Al-Hadikhia chooses 3 players. Each chosen player chooses to live or die.
